title: Saying no: a few words to young women about sex
creator_credit: Crommie and Crommie, David Crommie and Karen Crommie
brief_description: Aimed at adolescent girls this film shows them how to cope with demands made by boys or men for sexual relations when they do not wish to participate. Highlights some standard manipulative responses by males to females when they are denied sex and indicates how girls should go about handling such responses in an assertive manner.
